column2: let's talk food.  I've been here a couple of times now
column3: and will be a fan of the hot crab dip forever.  It's creamy and cheesy and salty and delicious.  The first time I went
column4: I had the veggie burger (patty melt style) which wasn't good.  I'm sorry to say it
column5: but it was almost flat out disgusting.  Fortunately
column6: the person I was there with ordered the fish tostadas
column7: which were great.  The fries are skinny and yummy (although I'm sure they don't make you skinny).  Best part of the meal?  The choco taco dessert.  Ridiculously amazing.
